name: Slider
description: General-purpose single and range slider engine with snapping and pluggable builders.

use: you need a configurable single-value slider.
you need a configurable range slider.
you need custom slider track, fill, thumb, ticks, or overlays.
avoid: a text input is required for exact numeric entry.

theming: Override `trackBuilder`, `fillBuilder`, `thumbBuilder`, `ticksBuilder`, and `overlayBuilder` per-instance for custom visuals.
accessibility: Semantics include slider role and enabled state.
do: Use presets (`brightness`, `rangeSoft`, `stepsDots`, `waveform`) for quick visual styles.
Use `WaveSlider` when you need a waveform-only scrubber with no linear track.
Use preset variant wrappers (`BrightnessSlider`, `RangeSoftSlider`, `StepsDotsSlider`, `WaveformSlider`) for clearer intent.
dont: Do not hide value context when precision matters.

patterns.title: Range slider
patterns.code:
Slider.range(
  rangeValue: const ShadRangeValue(0.2, 0.8),
  min: 0,
  max: 1,
  onChanged: (value) {},
)
